BASE MOTION(DOF, AMPLITUDE).description: BASE MOTION with parameter(s) DOF, AMPLITUDE.

body: *BASE MOTION, DOF=${1}, BASE NAME=${2}, LOAD CASE=${3}, SCALE=${4}, TYPE=${5}

body: *BASE MOTION, DOF=${1}, AMPLITUDE=${2}, BASE NAME=${3}, LOAD CASE=${4}, SCALE=${5}, TYPE=${6}, IMAGINARY=${7}
